description: Freedon of choice is the fundamental concept that one has to understand in order to make right decision, acts effectively, and interact with others. In short,we need freedom to scceed in life. The course examines the concept of freedom from philosophical, political, and economic perspectives. In particular, it concentrates on the relationships between economic and political freedom in the free market economy and liberal political systems. Is either type of freedom more funcamental that another? Some Legal implications, including freedom of expression and freedom of religiion, will be also discussed.
name: ECON & POLITICAL FREEDOM
